FragilityCurve.Description: Costing to be furnished by user. Consequence data assumes 16 SF of damage area.
FragilityCurve.Name: Unsecured fragile objects on shelves, unknown restraint
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data. Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence. Import errors: Warning, Data missing: E2022.010:DS1:Time: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: E2022.010:DS1:Time: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: E2022.010:DS1:Time: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: E2022.010:DS1:Time: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5 Warning, Data missing: E2022.010:DS1:Cost: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: E2022.010:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: E2022.010:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: E2022.010:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5

DamageState.Description: Object falls off shelf or shelf overturns and object breaks or object breaks within cabinet

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Replace object. Note: user must supply cost of replacement.
